Uses of Class
stonehorse.candy.Trampoline.Continuation

    • Uses of Trampoline.RecursiveVal in stonehorse.candy

      Fields in stonehorse.candy with type parameters of type Trampoline.RecursiveVal 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> Trampoline.RecursiveVal.fun 
      Methods in stonehorse.candy that return Trampoline.RecursiveVal 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> Trampoline.done(V v)
      return done to when last value is found
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> Trampoline.recur(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> f)
      return recur to recur withLast f and a
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> Trampoline.seq(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> f, V v)
      return seq to yield lazy value v, and continue withLast f a f as null is same as done or stop, depending on v Will behave like recur on a trampoline
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> Trampoline.stop()
      Return stop when done without a value.
      Method parameters in stonehorse.candy with type arguments of type Trampoline.RecursiveVal 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <A,V> Iterable<V> Trampoline.lazy(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> fun)
      Emits a lazy Iterable recuring until stop, done, null or lack of f
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> Trampoline.recur(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> f)
      return recur to recur withLast f and a
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> Trampoline.seq(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> f, V v)
      return seq to yield lazy value v, and continue withLast f a f as null is same as done or stop, depending on v Will behave like recur on a trampoline
      static <V> V Trampoline.trampoline(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> fun)
      Will recur on fun until done(value)
